definition: surname Gan/abbr. for Gansu Province 甘肅省|甘肃省[Gan1 su4 Sheng3]

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyse the chemical composition of volatile oil from the leaves of Glycyrrhiza Inflata Batal.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析胀果甘草叶的挥发性化学成分。

sentences.english: Objective To verify the specificity and validity of the microbial limit tests of glycyrrhetinic acid.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立适合于甘草酸的微生物限度检查方法。

sentences.english: The drug concentration of Zhi Gancao Decoction contained serum was examined by serologic pharmacological test.
sentences.chinese: 血清药理学法确定血清中炙甘草汤含药浓度。

sentences.english: Studied the antisenility effect of liquorice flavone on mice.
sentences.chinese: 研究了甘草黄酮对小鼠的抗衰老作用。

sentences.english: Glycyrrhizin greatly inhibited the forming of plaque units.
sentences.chinese: 甘草甜素能明显减少空斑的形成。

sentences.english: Objective To compare diffenrent amounts of the glycyrrhizic acid extracted by two methods-decoct method and Ammonia-water method.
sentences.chinese: 目的比较水酸法和氨水法提取甘草酸含量的变化。

sentences.english: Conclusion 70% is the best alcohol concentration of Guizhi Gancao Decoction extracted by SBAE.
sentences.chinese: 结论桂枝甘草汤SBAE法的醇沉浓度以70%为佳。

sentences.english: Apart from China, How popular are liquorice candies in Asia ?
sentences.chinese: 除了中国，甘草糖在亚洲是如何流行的？

sentences.english: Most components of CP-RG could be found in the HP which could be found in two sigle herbs.
sentences.chinese: 黄柏的组分和甘草的组分在药对中基本都能找到。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To analyse the chemical constituents from the roots of Glycyrrhiza pallidiflora Max.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析刺果甘草根的化学成分。

sentences.english: After that, we conducted the statistic analysis on the empirical data.
sentences.chinese: 结果拆方后甘草酸含量经数理统计分析有明显差异。

sentences.english: Licorice root tea is great for sore throats .
sentences.chinese: 甘草根茶对缓解喉咙痛是有帮助。

sentences.english: Most of us know licorice as a tasty treat.
sentences.chinese: 我们大多数人知道甘草作为一种好吃。

sentences.english: Object To study the chemical constituents of alkaloids of Amsonia sinensis Tsiang extracted with methanol.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究水甘草甲醇提总生物碱的化学成分。

sentences.english: To determine constancy of Diammonium Glycyrrhizinate injection.
sentences.chinese: 测定甘草酸二铵注射液的药物稳定性。

sentences.english: Glycyrrhizin is a kind of food additive which has a bright future.
sentences.chinese: 甘草素是一种很有发展前途的食品添加剂。

definition: huangqi/milk vetch root (used in TCM)/Astragalus membranaceus or Astragalus mongholicus
Chinese thorowax (Bupleurum chinense)/root of Chinese thorowax (used in TCM)
root of herbaceous peony (Paeonia lactiflora), used in TCM
the rhizome of large-headed atractylodes (Atractylodes macrocephaia)
Amomom (fructus Amomi), plant used in Chinese medicine
root bark of the peony tree (used in TCM)
common water plantain (Alisma plantago-aquatica)/water plantain rhizome (used in TCM)
